created_by: Florian Roth, Teymur Kheirkhabarov, Daniil Yugoslavskiy, oscd.community
name: Credential Dumping Tools Service Execution
description: Detects well-known credential dumping tools execution via service execution events
false_positives: Legitimate Administrator using credential dumping tool for password recovery
query: file.path:(/.*[Ff][Gg][Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc].*/ OR /.*[Dd][Uu][Mm][Pp][Ss][Vv][Cc].*/ OR /.*[Cc][Aa][Cc][Hh][Ee][Dd][Uu][Mm][Pp].*/ OR /.*[Mm][Ii][Mm][Ii][Dd][Rr][Vv].*/ OR /.*[Gg][Ss][Ee][Cc][Dd][Uu][Mm][Pp].*/ OR /.*[Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Pp][Ww].*/ OR /.*[Pp][Ww][Dd][Uu][Mm][Pp].*/)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`file.path:(*fgexec* OR *dumpsvc* OR *cachedump* OR *mimidrv* OR *gsecdump* OR *servpw* OR *pwdump*)`
